first_time_buyer.description: This customer is new to luxury cars and is looking for their first purchase
first_time_buyer.approach: Educate about the product, provide guidance and assurance

car_enthusiast.description: This customer has a passion for luxury cars and is knowledgeable about them
car_enthusiast.approach: Engage in detailed discussions, highlight unique features

investor.description: This customer sees luxury cars as an investment and is interested in value appreciation
investor.approach: Highlight potential value growth, discuss market trends

collector.description: This customer collects luxury cars for personal satisfaction or display
collector.approach: Showcase exclusivity, discuss car history and pedigree

corporate_buyer.description: This customer represents a company purchasing luxury cars for executives or clients
corporate_buyer.approach: Discuss bulk deals, highlight brand prestige

gift_buyer.description: This customer is buying a luxury car as a gift for someone else

introduction.description: Initial contact and understanding the customer's needs

exploration.description: Discussing various car options and features

closing.description: Securing the appointment for finalizing the purchase

greeting.template: Hello {customer_name}, how can we assist you today?

appointment_proposal.template: Would you be available for an appointment {time_reference}?

feature_highlight.template: One unique feature of this car is {feature_description}

price_discussion.template: The price for this model is {price}

objection_handling.template: I understand your concern about {objection}, however...

value_proposition.template: By choosing this car, you'll benefit from {value_proposition}

closing_statement.template: Looking forward to seeing you {time_reference}. Have a great day!

reassurance.template: We understand that this is a big decision, and we're here to support you

follow_up.template: Just checking in to see if you have any more questions about {car_model}

descriptions.interest: Customer's interest level in the product/service
descriptions.urgency: Customer's urgency to make a decision
descriptions.trust: Customer's trust level in the salesperson/company
